Class AuthorBibCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • AuthorBibCreator

  • public class AuthorBibCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    AuthorBibCreator Class Creates Bibliography files with IEEE, ACM and NJ formats from bib files input

        Preprocess method Prepares the appropiate file to be outputted to

      • processBibFiles

        public static void processBibFiles(java.lang.String aname,
                                   java.util.Scanner[] s,
                                   Article[] a,
                                   java.io.File[] output)
        ProcessBibFiles method Accepts 10 open files, searches them for articles with a specific author name and outputs to the files passed in.
        Parameters:
        aname - The last name of the author being queried
        s - An array of Scanners to access the open input files
        a - An array of Article classes to store extracted data
        output - An array of output files
